word: G3349 - μετεωρίζω - meteōrízō - met-eh-o-rid'-zo - Be of doubtful mind

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Be of doubtful mind
wavering in mind, unsteady, doubtful, in suspense

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G3326 and a collateral form of G142 or perhaps rather of G109 (compare “meteor”); to raise in mid-air, that is, (figuratively) suspend (passively fluctuate or be anxious): - be of doubtful mind.
